cTypes.Variable: Accessible fields to gather input from app. Can be modified.
cTypes.Style: Holders of Widget configurations; can be used with style attribute to apply configuration of this holder
cTypes.Font: Allows to import font from file specified by filepath
cTypes.Tk: Main Tkinter window or Toplevel element. It is root element of whole file.
cTypes.ToolTip: Text of this element will be applied to the parent widget as tooltip

Attribs.Variable:name: Name of Variable
Attribs.Variable:value: Default value of Variable after start
Attribs.Style:name: Name of Style holder
Attribs.Tk:title: Title text of whole window
Attribs.Tk:geometry: Window size and position, in format of (WIDTH)x(HEIGHT)+(X)+(Y).
Attribs.Tk:resizable: If windows is resizable, in format of 'horizontal vertical' and replaced both values with 'true' or 'false'
Attribs.Tk:icon: Path to file for displayed icon
Attribs.RowColumnConfig:index: Indexes of row/column to be modified. Use space as delimeter for multiple indexes
Attribs.Grid:column: Column index of widget to place in
Attribs.Grid:row: Row index of widget to place in
